content.detailedDescription:
Only a few weeks after my friend and i witnessed a stationary ufo over a house in east windsor, nj, i witnessed another phenomenon. it was evening time, i remember i was playing a video game.  i stopped for a minute to eat a pumpkin muffin.  i put the rest of it down on my comforter and made some crumbs.  i admit i'm lazy a lot so normally i would have played my game some more then go brush them off later...No biggie.  for some reason i thought to myself, go brush them off now.  so i curled my heavy comforter up and walked out of the back door so i could brush the crumbs off on the ground.  i went through the door and closed it behind me.  it was very dark out, but a clear sky.  the second that i turned around and faced the door, and lifted my blanket in the air with my left hand, i saw a long flash of light wizz horizontally right over my house.  this thing was a long streak of light and it seemed like it went into something, (which i couldn't see), and vanished.  it was so low to my house it was scary.  it was lower than this big tree that's right across the street from me.  what it felt like to me was it was like "they" were spying on me and didn't expect me to come outside and high-tailed it out of there. 
and by the way, i've seen many meteors come into the atmosphere, some far up in the sky and some as close as this thing i saw.....This was not a meteor.
content.summary: Flash of light over my house

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from the outlets in jackson, nj with my friend ryan one night in november 2011, when i saw something strange in the sky.  we were coming through millstone, an area with expensive houses and some fields.  we were on a long straight road, probably 2 miles long.  it was a very clear night, the moon was partially out so much was visiable.  being someone who is fascinated with the earth and its mysteries, i look up at the sky often.  so when i saw this object was perplexed because i know what helicopters, airplanes, birds, stars, etc. look like in the sky.  this was none of these.  at first i thought it was a very bright star.  but as we approached it i could see a blinking light right next to it.  we got closer and closer to it and as we did i could see that it was very low to the ground for anything that would be flying in the sky.  we actually parked on the side of the road when we were the close to it.  we could see that is was only a few hundred feet in the air, lower than that altitude that helicopters fly.  it was totally still and making no noise at all.  it was shaped like a stop sign, but only had five or six sides.  there was one white light in the middle surrounded by four-six multi-colored lights.  they were green, blue, red/orange, and yellow. we looked at it was a few minutes, questioned each other on what the hell it could be, then took off because we knew it wasnt anything we had ever seen.  as we left the seen i kept looking behind me to see if it had made a move, but it stayed still the entire time.  i grew up in this area and i know everything around here, this was something else.  however, what freaked me out even more is when happened a few weeks later....
content.summary: 5-6 sided stationary ufo over house in mercer co, nj

content.detailedDescription: 2 days before there was an earthquake in okla.  1 day before i felt a tremor at my house. we live in the country in a rural area. that night i was watching t.V. and heard a slight rumble, so i went outside on my back porch. i noticed a light to the northwest just above the tree line, behind our neighbors house. i thought it might be a helicopter with a spot light. the light began to rise and hover, coming toward me.  the object was about 100' directly over me, when i realized it wasnt anything man-made. it was about the size of a b 52 bomber. it was a boomerang shape with a huge white glowing light in the front, on the bottom was 2 triangle shaped lights, one was red and one was green. both were blinking in alternating pattern. the triangle shaped lights that were red and green were unlike any lights ive ever seen. the sound it made was a quiet rumble, unlike any engine sound ive ever heard. when it was directly over me, it hovered for about 15 seconds, which scared me to death.  i jumped under the porch in fear.  then realized i had to see more. i came back out to see it start to move over our house toward the east, i ran inside the house to wake up my wife, who was asleep and didnt get up.  i went back outside and watched it go over my inlaws house and hover over a gas well across the street.  still heading east, it disappeared over the trees.  i saw something shoot across the sky to the north and never seen it again.  when this occurred my feelings were excited and horrified. while the ufo was over me, i felt frozen, like i couldnt move a muscle. since the incident, i am still having unbelievable fears and excitement, which are undescribable. i would love to talk with anyone who has had a similar experience or has knowledge in this area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed a bright light come towards me whenover me it hovered,saw blinking red and green triangles on boomerang shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I do not speak english, i'm going through google translator.
we were in the house, facing the mountain because some people had told us they had ufo sightings in those days, when we saw a light slowly down the mountain (the mountain is called "pe���a de juaica") came to the mountain quad , we saw it "off."
this happened a few nights.
another night we saw a ufo fell rapidly changed color to fall, and is "switched off" before hitting the mountain, after this we saw another ufo traversed the sky at an average speed, this was a light incadesente of yellow color. this happened in december 2010.
other sightings have been in place for the village community.

we react with surprise, we could not believe it, we began to earch for a logical explanation, a child began to mourn and cry, but then we calmed down and everything returned to normal.

when this writer was a light lit up my room for two or three seconds ... i'm a little scared and a
content.summary: Some light was flying to go to the mountain, here it was turn off. this happen some nigths.

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en el patio de la casa y estaba viendo la luna,empece a girar la mirada para ver todo el cielo y note que 2 estrellas empezaron a moverce,al principio pense que estaba mariado entonces fui adentro a buscar mi celular para grabarlo pero la camara no pudia captar nada y lo deje,y luego una de las estrellas desvio su curso hacia el lado derecho de donde estaba viendo y la segui viendo hasta que la perdi de vista
content.summary: Parecia una simple estrella

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the window when i saw a light that caught my eye. i saw it was a airplane but while i was viewing it, i saw 6 lights that all flashed in order from bottom to top in a pyramid form about 2-3 miles away then dissapeared. about 3 seconds later i alerted my sister and brother then they said it was nothing. i kept looking and again the same thing occured about 2 miles further than the previouse one. then again until it was out of sight.
content.summary: 6 flashing light s that flashed one at a time very high, very big, and very bright. far away and unexplainable

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i saw the object in the evening sky at about 6 pm. we first saw it near the constellation orion, but as the night went on, orion mved and the object did not. the ufo stayed in the same spot until midnight when we went to bed. we do not know how long it stayed there, but it was gone the next night. we searhed the whole sky and could not find it.

the ufo was a circular shape that had some type of waves coming off each side. the ufo was flashing lights continuously the entire time we saw it. it flashed orange, red, blue, green, white, and yellow. there was no order to the flashing of the colors or the timing of the flashes. however, the lights did get brighter and dimmer randomly.

at one point, a plane or helicopter flew across the sky. in comparison the ufo was much larger, brighter, and definitely stationary.
content.summary: Several of us saw the bright object in the sky. thought it was plane or star, but did not move and flashed too many colors to be a star.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog and looking at the sky. i saw a bright object in the sky it looked like a star but it was moving. there was five airplanes in the sky this object did not look like them. there was no flashing colored lights. i watched the object for about 10 minutes until i walked behind a house and as i walked out from behind the house it was gone. i don't know if was the iss or a satelite. but i would like to know.
content.summary: Slow moving star.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a buddy of mine were standing around a fire at 1:30am saturday night enjoying the beautiful weather we`ve been having here in south central pennsylvania. i had to retreve something from my garage when i looked over to the west and seen a aspirin sized yellow/orange colored object low in the sky.
i got out my smart phone and opend up the google skymap app to see if it was a rising planet or something. according to the skymap app there wasnt anything there but a few minor stars.
i decided to go get my binoculars and check it out. i rested the binoculars on a tree branch so the image was steady. when looking at the object i was amazed by what i was seeing. 
i was a beautiful pale white color, almost the same color as the moon itself. inside of the glow was a defined, perfectly round sphere with sort of a patterned or textured surface. even though it was a few miles away i could still see the textured surface. after hovering about 5-7mins the object slowly decended below a tree line and was gone.
content.summary: Observed yellow-orange sphere low in sky...Red lion pa

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were heading back to arizona after spending a few days in california, anaheim to be exact. there was 6 of us total riding in a minivan we had rented. it was around 7pm, and we had made it across the border, and were now traveling through some small, small cities such as brenda and hope where there is very little life and activity, although i don't know exactly where we were at the time.

the sun had completely set. my sister was watching out the window while the rest of us were doing other activities in the van. my sister suddenly says she thinks she just saw a ufo. she described that she had seen a ball of orange-reddish light appear in the north-west sky, and then suddenly fade out, much like how a fire is put out. she was quite certain of what she saw and was trying to describe it as well as she could. in the middle of describing it, my brother-in-law, who is driving, suddenly says, "you mean like that??" and points to the sky right in front of him. my other sister, sitting in the passenger seat, then gasps, obviously seeing it as well. they described seeing two red lights side by side, seemingly attached to the same object. a second later, one red light went out, and the other one followed. they were not seen again.

after two different sightings, all of us had our eyes glued to the sky. about 5 minutes later, my brother-in-law yells that he is seeing something moving above us. all of us see a yellow-orange ball moving in a strange, but controlled fashion. it was a bright ball, that would fade out while moving sideways, and then a second later would reappear and continue this pattern about 5 or 6 times, all the while moving in the same direction. you could see the shapes of where the ball had faded out. then it was just gone. no trace of anything falling. all of us were stunned, it did not look or move like anything any of us had seen before.

so this whole time we are still driving at around 60-65 mph. no cars in front or behind us. we are all looking out our windows to see if anyone else spots something. i'm behind my sister who spotted the first ufo, so we're both looking out the same side window. after a while, my sister and i spotted something at the exact same time. there was a dim, orange ball just above the horizon that had just appeared, and then disappeared again. a few seconds after it disappeared a bright, bigger one appeared slightly above the dim one, and hovered for a second, then went out like a flame. it was the exact thing my sister had described about an hour earlier when she saw the first ufo. for the next twenty minutes, we lost count on how many objects we saw. a bright yellow/orange/reddish ball would appear in different areas of the sky, and seconds later would dim out, like a flame. there was a big, bright star we had kept our eye on for reference, so that we could see if the ball was appearing in the same place or if it was definitely moving. sometimes the ball would appear close to the horizon to the left hand side of the star, and a while later it would appear farther away from the horizon on the right hand side of the star. so this whole while, we're traveling at 60 mph and we're still seeing the object appear. it was definitely moving, it was not stationary. 

after 20 minutes of seeing many, many objects, the activity had stopped. 40-45 minutes went by and we stopped looking, also we had passed through mountains and had simply thought that we could not see them anymore. i happen to look back out the window at the edge of a mountain that was the same distance as the horizon we were looking at. another ball had appeared but this time, it did not disappear. we immediately pulled over to watch it. the ball was stationary for a few seconds, and 3 of us saw it move slightly up and down, and back and forth. it was very slight, but it was definitely a moving light. the other 3 thought that it was a stationary light that had just come from behind the mountain while we were driving. after a few minutes of it not moving, we're all convinced it was just a light that had appeared from behind the mountain. as we were about to drive away, the light suddenly disappeared. it was not a light that was behind the mountain, it was the same orange light we had been seeing. it reappeared a second later, and disappeared again. 

none of us had any explanations for any of the things we had seen. we saw 3 different kinds of objects and lights in a time frame of about 2 hours traveling at 65 mph. all 6 of us had seen these lights. they were not fireworks, they were not flares. nothing ever fell from the light, they just disappeared as quickly as they appeared. we googled on my sisters phone the things we had seen, and we found a story almost exactly like ours in almost the exact location, the story was in congress, which is very close to where we were. it inspired us to share our story, because they were almost identical. we believe we saw the same things as they did. i wish i had an answer as to what we saw, but i think for now, it shall remain a mystery.
content.summary: It had a glow like fire. the shape was close to a sphere.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home after work when i looked up and saw a huge craft triangular in shape with 3 white lights on corner and red pulsating light at center of craft. i was driving and at time ocject was above me it turned and flew in straight path. i stoped at traffic lights and recorded object on phone. this object was enormous and clear to the naked eye. never ever seen anything like it ever but when researching internet stumbled across the dudley dorito and somethind supposedly government called br3b but also looking further back and came across something that happened in brussels years ago and im 100% sure it was the same craft only difference being the red pulsating light emitting form centre of craft. craft was silent and it was shocking to think if it was government why so visible. it didnt try to hide or move fast but was huge. nearly crashed my car i was that shocke. have video but file very large
content.summary: On way home after wprk huge triangle above head perfectly clear to human eye no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I am traveling east bound on old york road at approximately 5:15 pm. i had just entered the border for harford county, maryland from pa. there is a full moon almost directly to the left of me, and a setting sun in the opposite direction to the right of me. there are some high-thin clouds, but it is a relatively clear night ��� and the setting sun is still providing quite a bit of daylight, while the full moon outside of my car window is big and bright. i am glancing at it every 15-30 seconds ��� traffic is very light and this allows me to take a 1 to 2 second peek at the beautiful, rising full moon. 
if directly above me is 50 degrees, then i would put the moon to my left at 10-15 degrees above the horizon and the sun to my right at about 5 degrees above the horizon ��� the bottom of the sun was just touching the horizon basically. the positions of each are important to understand the amount of light and what i was able to see. 
then, i look at it - and notice something obstructing my view. it is somewhat thin and black and at a tilt ��� the thing is i only see the left side of the object where the moon���s left surface ends. i roll down my window, the object is still there ��� but it appears to be moving slowly across my view of the moon.  it looks like there���s a big dark scratch on the moon, but it���s moving from left to right. 
2 seconds later, this thing, still on a slant, is taking up the full length of the moon from my position ��� which has not changed because the road is fairly straight on the part where i am driving. then, i only see the object, apparently still moving from left to right, from towards the middle of the moon to its right edge. another words i don���t see the entire object anymore ��� almost like it is circling the moon.   the right side of it i now cannot see ��� but given the amount of light, and how large it appears to be, i should see something. 
now, if this were an airplane, due to its size (at one point it took up my entire view of the moon) then it���s length would suggest to me that it was close enough to me to be able to distinguish other features (and see pulsating lights = much as you do when you see a plane cross the sky). if it were a plane that was too far away for me to distinguish, it would have had to have been much smaller ��� not large enough to be the entire length of the moon. the other disturbing thing is, it���s definitely an object that took up the entire length of the moon from my perspective. however, i apparently did not see the left side of it as it moved into view, nor did i see the right side of it as it passed from left to right. it was absolutely light enough for me to be able to see if it were an airplane. and, if it were too dark, i should have seen some sort of airplane lights ��� there were none. it basically disappeared as quickly as it appeared, even though it appeared to be moving somewhat slowly. 
i continued to look in the direction of the moon for several minutes, and to the right of the moon, to see if i would finally see some airplane lights so that i had an explanation for what it was. i saw no air traffic whatsoever. 

i would love an explanation to what i saw, or even some logical suggestions.  the experience is definitely freaking me out ��� i���ve never seen anything like it that i could not explain logically. (airplane, balloon, meteor, etc). it was definitely massive.

i can provide sketches if requested.
content.summary: Extremely large disc/cigar object takes up entire length of full moon and disapears

content.detailedDescription: On january 7, the at about 7:25 pm, i was exiting my home with my children, waiting on my wife to finish getting ready for a birthday dinner party of my niece's. the wife took a lot longer than expected, and the moon was full and rising over the neighborhood roof tops toward the east to slightly ne at this time of year. i decided to take a still photo of it with my i-phone 3g, with my younger 8 year old daughter and my 5 year old son near by. soon as the camera function booted up and view finder engaged, i pointed it at the moon, but imediatly noticed a bright blue glowing small orb below and toward the left about a 7:00 o clock position below the moon. it was about 15-20 degrees out from the the moon disc. it was only visible through the electronic view finder of the i-phone, but not to the naked eye. it was stationary in relation to the moon. i moved the camera around to see if it could be a lens refraction from the neighborhood lights, but it stayed put in relation to the moon. i looked around to see if anybody had blue lights around, like christmas lights, but non observed. i kept looking at the part of the sky where it appeared in the view finder, but no orb, no bright stars, or planets were any where nearby. i then being aware that electronic cameras, can see wave lengths of light not seen by the naked eye, i proceeded to photo graph it. upon engaging the zoom function on the still camera function, to draw the orb close in the view finder for a closer photo, i saw what appeared to be electrical, charge, or static like texture to the orb, like static on a off channel on older analog tvs, and rapid dancing gold, silver, yellow and pinkish or rose electrical sparking or arcing around the edges of the orb disc. like those tesla balls you would purchase at sharper image novelty electronic stores with the frankenstein style electrical plasma charges dancing all around a glass globe. i then proceeded to take stills and engage my video function as well, but the video function lacks the zoom capability of the still function. now the one neighbor, i have near by, the father of a girl my daughter plays with, and my children and wife also came over to look at it through the view finder. i attempted to use my wife's i-phone to also view it, but her's, also the same make model and style, bought at the same time and place as mine didn't show the object. even both held side by side pointing at the spot of the orb. we had to go to our party on miami beach. so a stopped photos and film. as we were on our way to 79th st causeway on miami bch. i hit a red light at 826 and bird rd. i rolled the window down engaged the camera, and used it to relocate the object still in it's position. guess the time was about 8:00 or 8:20 pm. we arrived at the trio's on the bay at 1601 79th st. causeway, north bay village, miami, fl. 33141. at 8:50-9:00 pm. i stepped out of the car and turned on the camera again, sure enough it was still in it's original position. seemed not as bright from this location. now i thought if i just traveled 35-40 miles and it is still in its relative original position, this thing has to be very high or outside of the planet's atmosphere. i continued to take photos, using references and other sources, like passing aircraft, buildings, palm trees, etc. for references, and film clips of the object both in front of and on the dockside deck of the restaraunt till my battery got low about 10-10:30 pm. had to shut my phone down to save. i also attempted to use other family member's i-phones and other camera type phones to view the object. only one other i_phone in the group of 4 camera phones seemed to see the object. older black berry and flip phones did not see it when engaged for camera mode. periodically through out the night till we left at 11:45-11:50 pm, i engaged the phone briefly to observe the object. it was there till till we were leaving, then upon one last view attempt with almost dead battery, i noticed it was gone!!!!! by now the moon was directly overhead to slightly toward the west. mary margaret zimmer of mufon has my complete collection of still shots and 4 video clips of the object downloaded in her computer today january, sunday 8th at 1:45 pm, she will be following up with the video evidence!!!!
content.summary: Blue glowing orb not visible to the naked eye, but through the view finder of smart phones.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the dog out last night when i saw a very bright ball of orange/yellow light which appeared just above the crest of a hill south of the house. it was about 11:00 to 11:30 on a moonlit night with some wispy clouds in the sky. as the lights came closer i could see that they were on an aircraft and i thought it might be on fire and might crash. i then realized it was on a straight course towards the house and didn't appear to be in distress. as the object and the lights came closer i could see that they were attached to an aircraft of some kind and as it came above the valley just south of the house i could hear a droning sound like that of a plane far off in the distance. but it was nothing if compared to the deafening noise a commercial aircraft of such size and so close by would make. 

i saw the object from below as it passed over the house in a northwesterly direction. it appeared to be a very large black matte or dark grey flat object with a shape between a square and a diamond. it was much bigger than the house. i couldn't see any distinguishing marks on the lower part, but the lights were very bright--the brightest i've ever seen and the colors were very vivid. they seemed to be both orange and yellow at the same time, but in no discernible pattern. there was a light on each point of the object, but there may have been 2 more. i remember thinking that the shape was odd in some way--it's wasn't easy to find a frame of reference to describe it. it also happened very quickly and i was a little frightened by what i was seeing. i couldn't hear any sounds until the craft was very close by and they faded quickly as it moved northward and out of sight.

i'll try and draw a picture of what i saw, but it will be very difficult. the angle of viewing wasn't straight forward and i'm not an artist.
content.summary: large diamond-shaped matte black aircraft with extremely bright flamelike lights flying at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down adams road with my mom and we saw the lights. one of the lights disappeared. when i met up with my friends about half an hour later, we saw it again. we followed it and my friend got some of it on video using her ipod (she was in a car so the footage is kind of shaky). as we were following it, it seemed to turn on it's side and did a 180. one of the lights started blinking frantically we lost it and then went over to an elementary school to see if it would come back. we saw it again but it was farther away and not moving. a few minutes later we saw a helicopter circling the area where we had seen the ufo.
content.summary: 2 bright lights right next to eachother, hovered then zoomed away

content.detailedDescription: I was in my apartment looking out my open window i saw an extremely bright white orb in the sky that appeared to hover i grabbed my camera as fast as i could but by the time i got it the orb was gone physicaly saw it for 5-10 seconds and it was about a mile or so away from where i was and so everyone knows its really hard to fill out this ufo report on a droid phone it just doesnt allign properly on the screen most of the time your typing so if some ones post looks like it was done by a 5 year old it could be just because there posting from a cell phone
content.summary: Extremely bright white orb over springfield oregon

content.detailedDescription: While traveling south in the slow lane on interstae 91 at4:50 am on tues.Jan.5th, i looked in my driver's side mirror and noticed a black triangular object with large yellow lights approximately 50ft. above and directly over the roof of a car, about 300-500ft. in the fast lane. after about 5 seconds i refocused my driving to the road in front of me as i was headed towards the breakdown lane.I manuevered my vehicle back into the slow lane and once again looked into the driver's side mirror and the object was gone. the vehicle behind me in the fast lane was still proceeding south behind me. the entire event lasted about 10 seconds. as i proceeded south as looked through my driver's side window and passenger side window into the sky looking for the object, it didn't reappear! after i proceeded approximately a mile south on the interstate i saw what looked like a red "shooting star" with a streak in the sky directly in front of me lasting about 2 seconds.
content.summary: Saw black triangular object w/yellow lights approx.50' above car behind me on highway

content.detailedDescription: My mother is the person who saw this.  she was driving home from work on route 27 in exeter, nh heading towards epping when she saw a large red-orange almost flame colored object rise up beyond some trees. the shape was like a circle with the top portion cut off.  she said all around the top was grey fog/mist coming from it.  it went from one side of the road to the other in the blink of an eye.  it then stayed within view for about twenty minutes as she continued on her way home on route 125 n in epping.
content.summary: Large flame colored almost round object seen hovering above tree line in exeter, nh. watched it move around for about 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: For some reason the thought of ufos jumped into my head on my way home from the grocery store jan 7th 2012 at about 9:45pm. as i turned left onto my road in the distance i saw them. this orange orb broke into three similar size orange orbs. the primary one did not move and the other two shot away from the primary object and about 45 degree angles. the orbs then leveled off and travel south one behind the other paralleled to the ground. so i sped up my car almost wrecking it as i pulled into my driveway, i went as fast as i possibly could and ran inside to tell my wife so she could also see. as i explained what thoughts i had and what i saw she said the thought of ufos had entered her too she didn't know why. at the same moment of her strange thoughts she said she heard a scratching nose at the window and had just let the dog right minutes before i got home to see what it was. the orange orbs unfortunately had gone before she could see them. as i explained to her what i saw more began to appear and there were 30 or more traveling southward perpendicular to the road i live on. approximation 1 mile away traveling just above the tree line in a snake like motion up and down glowing orange. this lasted about 15 min. i took photos with my nikon d300. for the conditions i had to shoot the photos with i think they came good enough to portray the event. a passing motorist also saw the event.
content.summary: There were 30 or more traveling southward perpendicular to the road i live on. approximation 1 mile away traveling just above the trees in a snake like motion up and down glowing orange

content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking a cigarette at a buddys home in the sugar house district of salt lake city, when all of a sudden lots of noise could be heard from the sky, characteristic of the sounds associated with aircraft, except much closer.  i looked up in the sky and saw an object in the night sky so large and different looking from anything ive seen, i wonder how it got off the ground to begin with.  it travelled as if hovering, while moving in a steady quick-paced fashion.  the event was probably over and done with in 30 seconds or so, but it was enough time for me to make out multiple and distinguishable colored rectanglular lights on the bottom of this object.  at the same time i believe more traditional aircraft (helicopters) were close by, but my eyes were all on the single biggest craft.

i felt fearful looking up and for the first time in my life not having an idea what was flying above me.  i rushed back in to tell my friends after the craft passed beyond the roofline and my visibility, and got some strange looks.  i worried a little bit about how i might handle the situation of being abducted for a while.  on my way back home, i heard what sounded like a foghorn, which struck me as unusual here.  i dont know whether what i saw was extra-terrestrial or top secret, but whatever it was, people dont know about it.
content.summary: Very large solid object that i didnt know what was flying above me.

content.detailedDescription: This incident, with the consent of the witness, is being reported by investigator beverly trout.  witness was on way home from work & incident occurred sometime during time span of 12:30-1:30 a.M., probably on july 6, 2011.  witness thought shape might indicate that it was the b-2 bomber at what she considered low level, moving on a straight-line trajectory transit, during which it moved almost overhead her car - she remembers viewing it through her open sunroof.  she also observed the object as it continued on its way and passed over a nearby housing development.  object was silent, and had no lights.
content.summary: Watched what appeared like b-2 bomber with no lights move silently almost overhead at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I   was  driving  a  vehicle  delivering  the  last  pizza  for  the  night.  2345pm!  observed  on  housing  estate  some  quarter-mile  in  sky,  a  very  large  looking  star.  blush-silver  four  points.  slowed  vehicle  to  stop  and  switched  off  engine, ( a automatic-procedure  for  one  whom  ran  a  ufo-group  and  had  seen  three  other  ufos.)  watched star-form  for  about  two-minutes,  then  it  the star  suddenly  went-out  vanished!  wound  down  drivers  window  on  van  to  see  any  further  phenomena?  i  was  quickly  rewarded/  observed  in  the  very  clear  crisp  night  sky  a  oval-craft  some  forty  feet  in  length  and  ten=ft  from  base  to  dome-aperture  at  top.  i  watched  from  the  van  as  it  moved  less  than  5mph,  clearly  observed  the  following  happen,  some  eighty-ft  in  the  air. bright  clear  night  a  few  celestial  stars.  the  craft  was  a  rusty  red  colour  the  hull  reminding  one  of  metal  just  removed  from  a  furnace  and  "cooling-down"!  there  was no  audible  sound  whatsoever, and  as  i  watched  for  a  further  minute  i  then  saw  an  array  of  orange-lights,  "or  to  be  more  precise" exhaust-ports! switch  on,  they  revolved  slowly  around  the  base  in  a  clockwise-fashion  observing  from  underneath. then  by  way  of  some  unknown  emission  from  these  ports  a  portal  began  to  emerge.  i  clearly  saw  spacetime  becoming  a  mirrored-flux,  a  shaking  of  space and  thence  the  very  slow  moving  craft  entered  into  this  created  flux  and dissapeared. so  i  have  come  to  the  conclusion  that/ the  large-star  shape  i  first  observed  some  ten-minutes  earlier  was  in  fact  an  opening  time  portal  or  gate  into  our  world. created  by  this  craft  which  i  then  saw  some  minutes  later  and  thence  watched  it  create  another  time-portal  in  front  of  mine  eyes! i  have  had  two  previous  encounters  with  ufo  craft  less  than  twenty-ft  away,  and  other  out  of  world  experiences.  i  am  now  arranging  to  see  a  regressionist  to  be put  under  and  the  result  videoed/audioed  and  thence  posted  to  u-tube!
content.summary: Encounter  with  oval-craft  witch  crated  time-portal/gate  in  front  of  my  eyes  less  than  eighty-ft  away  in  airspace.

content.detailedDescription: we live midtown harrisburg,pa  my friend and i  decided to go  for a walk . right after leaving i  looked to the  west for just a second and i saw a bright light that blinked at me. then i told him look at that light he replied :that is an airplane,. when i first saw it i thought it was a flying saucer. i told him lets just wait a few minutes and see. we waited for 5 minutes and the light was still there very slowly moving west. he went to get his coffee and i stayed in the spot and observing the light. 15 minutes later he returned and the light was still there. we even went downtown walking and  on the way there we continued to see the light (25 minutes walk) . by now farther west. this thing was (extremely bright) and it was (extremely far away). i estimate at least 9 miles away. at least 5000 feet above ground. because it was very bright it appeared to be closer and consequently lower. the duration of the sighting was of at least 45 minutes. i did not have any out of the ordinary feelings what so ever. we lost sight of it when we where downtown. by the time we started to walk back,  it was gone. but this things was around for a long ,long guys i would say 45 minutes. it was oval,the color of the light:pure white, changing to light orange, light copper and light red for short periods of time. blinking once in a while. i could also see  commercial airplanes  far away in the distance near it . but their light was very yellow and much much duller,  and smaller than the light from this object.In fact  i saw one airplane very close to us,, i think it was approaching  harrisburg.. and the light was still duller and yellower compared. now you may have an idea of what i mean when i say (bright) and huge. because to be that far and that high.. this thing must of being huge.
content.summary: It appear to be at least 7 miles and very very high. i would say an altitude of at least 3000 feet. but it looked closer bacause it was extremely bright and big.

content.detailedDescription: Dont want to write a whole big thing sorry but it was pretty crazy
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: At first what we thought were stars began to move

content.detailedDescription:
This is a quick drawing of the orb i reported on 1/7/12 in forest park, il. i saw this object at 11:25-27 am, cst.  it was white, had a straight-line path, emerged west going east.  

it had a beam or tail (gas emission?) that moved left to right, like a pendulum.  the tail was not bright, glowing or reflective like the orb.  a jet passed overhead moments earlier in the approximate area of the orb, and the orb seemed well above the jet. the orb was fast, and moved across the sky in approximately half the time it takes for a jet to follow the almost exact route.
content.summary: Drawing of orb with "tail" seen in forest park, il

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were headed home from the supermarket, our home drive is up towards the foot hills of lake havasu city "east" from lake. as we drove we spotted unusual lights along the foot hills and talked together about what we were witnessing. i took out my cell phone with the video camera and got lucky a got a few in the video... i have that video... in that video you hear our conversation and you can hear and see what we saw. the ufo's are seen at aprox 1min into the video, i left the 3min version intact to show in context what we seen as these strange lights went out of sight...

the lights seemed to follow along close to the ground (guessing a few hundred feet) and turn left over the top of the foot hills. the light were pulsing a red color light on and off. there were many over 50 i would guess. all the ufo's sighted were not videoed...




strange stuff happens
thanks
dan
content.summary: Pulsing light's along the foot hills

content.detailedDescription: It seemed to follow the power lines. i saw it while driving 40mph.As i slowed down to look it followed power lines. in opposite direction and disapeared.It seemed very flat there were two small exhaust trails coming from rear.It was kind of a pentagram shape with 4 0r five lights. i thought it was someone playing a joke with a kite. other car were around but didnt seem to see it.
content.summary: Pentagram shape

content.detailedDescription:
2006

12:00 pm.

i was sitting on my scooter on the corner of us hyw 41 and symmes rd. ingibsonton, fl. i looked up and observed 3 metallic balls flying around in the air approx 1000ft high. they were staying connected but moved around each other.

they were maneuvering in a figure 8 pattern but kept changing the leading 
ball. in other words they were revolving around each other as they 
patterened the figure 8. 

i would have to estimate them to have been 20-30 ft in diameter. one
was almost black and the other two were silver. they reflectd the sun.

it was a cloudy day so i could only see them in a break in the clouds.
i watched for about 15 seconds.
content.summary: Gibsonton, fl spheres figure 8 pattern

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to put a steak on the grille at my south charlotte home tonight at 7:00 this evening and saw the lights that were as described above.  i always look up when i go outside because i like to see the moon, stars, etc., and am also a pilot and interested in aircraft.  i called my wife out to see them. there were two sets of 4 lights, each set with the 4 lights moving in a box formation with 3 or 4 other single lights that followed the first 8 lights.  the altitude was simialr to a low-flying airplane the speed was constant.  the group was travelling roughly south to north and the turned toward the east.  they were orange in color and looked like small hot air balloons when the gas is fired at night, except the light was constant (unlike a hot air balloon) but had a flickering quality, like something was burning inside a translucent shell.  my first thought was balloons, but they would have been too small for the distance and moved as if powered (not like drifting with the wind), but there was no sound coming from them.  my next thought was powered hang gliders or ultralights, but there was no sound.   we live about 15 miles as the crow flies from charlotte-douglass airport. there was a passenger jet airliner in the area as is typical, but it was to my back as i stood viewing the lights and high enough to not drown out other noises in the area.  if the objects made any sound it had to be low volume.
content.summary: 10-12 glowing objects travelling s to n, then e, low altitude, silent in charlotte, nc
